title: The Downfall of Vegas
description:
Emily and Linda start off the podcast with the latest news out of Vegas that goalie Robin Lehner is out for the season, and how that story unfolded. Then they look ahead to some playoff matchups and what they expect to see.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Linda Cohn, Emily Kaplan
